channel.title: Web 3.0 on Wren Howell
channel.description: Recent content in Web 3.0 on Wren Howell

item.title: Web3
item.description: It is a new year with a competitive job market and plenty of people looking for new roles. Recently, I was in a Twitter space where participants and I talked about red flags to look for when joining a new team. The following are a few we identified when looking for a new team. In no particular order, here they are. Managers that do not have technical experience. This applies to people who are relatively early in their careers.
